name: VaccineLedger
description: A supply chain optimization platform that ensure quality, safety and fair distribution of COVID-19 and other vaccines

SDGs.evidenceText: Indian Express article about our pilot with an Indian Government to use VaccineLedger to ensure quality safety and fair distribution of COVID-19 drugs, vaccines and other related products. This is achieved by the platform by using blockchain technology to track and trace these products from manufacturer to consumers. World Economic Forum's article on VaccineLedger and the use cases it is solving with COVID-19 vaccine distribution.
